name: Space Gun (itch)
description:
THIS GAME WAS FITTED FOR A 4:3, ASPECT RATIO.

This is a project that was created for a class entitled "Human Computer Interaction." 

The premise is simple. You're a gun in space, and you press space, click, or tap to shoot. Make your way to the end of each level by using the physics of pseudo-space! 

If you have the time to answer 10 questions, click on the "exit survey" button on the main menu and answer our quick questionnaire. 

This is a prototype, and as such there may be occasional bugs as things have not been extensively tested. 

Extra game play details:

- Each level has badges you can unlock: Completion, Time, Shot count. You earn each by respectively completing the level, finishing under a certain time, and finishing under a certain amount of shots.

Controls:

- Click, Press Spacebar, or Tap to shoot
